description: If credentials are not collected for two weeks, [Ebury](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0377) encrypts the credentials using a public key and sends them via UDP to an IP address located in the DNS TXT record.(Citation: ESET Windigo Mar 2014)(Citation: ESET Ebury May 2024)

external_references.description: Bilodeau, O., Bureau, M., Calvet, J., Dorais-Joncas, A., Léveillé, M., Vanheuverzwijn, B. (2014, March 18). Operation Windigo – the vivisection of a large Linux server‑side credential‑stealing malware campaign. Retrieved February 10, 2021.
Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, May 1). Ebury is alive but unseen. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
